author: Jake Edmiston
title: Loblaw outlines coronavirus response plan after Superstore worker tests positive in Oshawa
description: Grocer emails thousands of shoppers who used their PC Optimum loyalty card at the store  to alert them
content:
Loblaw Cos. Ltd., the largest Canadian grocer, has its first case of an employee testing positive for coronavirus, the chain confirmed late Monday.
The staff member worked at a Real Canadian Superstore in Oshawa, Ont., Loblaw’s executive chairman Galen Westo… [+1522 chars]
